Steps.Description: Visiting the webpage and inspecting the source code

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker hypothesizes that there may be hidden information in the web application.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker visits the webpage and inspects the source code.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker finds a partial flag in the webpage source code.

Steps.Description: Exploring other files in the web application

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker suspects that there may be additional flag pieces in other files within the web application.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker finds another partial flag in the /static/js/main file.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker hypothesizes that the CSS file may contain additional hints or flag pieces.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker finds another potential hint in the /static/css/main.css file.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker hypothesizes that combining the flag pieces found so far will reveal the full flag.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker collects the flag pieces found in the webpage source code, /static/js/main file, and /static/css/main.css file.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker successfully combines the flag pieces to obtain the full flag.
